fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Single market, Digital economy and society, Sport
eu_initiatives: MTG's main focus is on the Digital Single Market including copyright, geoblocking, AVMS revision, spectrum, Cable and Satellite Directive, Telecoms regulation including net neutrality, Data Protection, Competition, consumer rights and e-commerce.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Association of Commercial Television in Europe (ACT) 
Association of Television and Radio Sales Houses (EGTA) 
Audiovisual Anti-Piracy Alliance (AAPA) 
Commercial Broadcasters Association (COBA)
goals__remit:
MTG is an international entertainment company and we produce, buy and show entertainment. 
 
You find our channels in over 130 countries, and we offer everything from the best TV series from the US to premium live sports like the Champions League and Formula 1 and locally produced series, reality TV and comedy, and even some of the world’s best eSports.  
 
It goes without saying that our content is available both on linear TV channels and on your terms, on demand, online.
